story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded with a passion for showcasing the beauty and culture of Sri Lanka, Planet Holiday has been creating unforgettable travel experiences for over a decade. We believe in authentic, sustainable tourism that benefits both our guests and local communities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide exceptional travel experiences that connect visitors with the rich culture, stunning landscapes, and warm hospitality of Sri Lanka while promoting sustainable tourism practices.
